post:
# Single's Day Offers! :)

We will have multiple ones, all listed at https://pulsedmedia.com/specials.php when active.

I will try to keep this list updated when new ones come about.

## 1st offer: Managed Dediseedbox Annual Discount

Our first 11.11 Single's Day offer is 11.11% Discount on top of regular 20% annual signup discount + 1 FREE T-Shirt + 1 FREE Extra Month on our MDS series.

Shirts are original Fruit Of The Loom T-shirts, sizes S through 5XL available. Made to order, shipment in ~2months after order. Insert size info on comments. Will need valid shipping address.

### MDS 12TB:

 * 4x3TB RAID0
 * Opteron 6Core
 * 24GB ECC Ram
 * 1Gbps Unmetered
 * Final price: 31.99€ per month (total 383.92€)

### MDS 32TB:

 * 4x8TB RAID0
 * Opteron 6Core
 * 24GB ECC Ram
 * 1Gbps Unmetered
 * Final price: 71.10€ per month (total 853.26€)

#### Standard features:

 * rtorrent/ruTorrent
 * HTTP, HTTPS, FTP, SFTP, LFTP, SSH access
 * OpenVPN included
 * autodl-irssi, sonarr, pyload, rclone, resilio, syncthing, btsync, ffmpeg, fuse (unionfs, sshfs, s3fs etc)
 * [Very Strong Privacy Policy](http://wiki.pulsedmedia.com/index.php/Pulsed_Media_Privacy_Policy)
 * [14-day full moneyback guarantee](http://wiki.pulsedmedia.com/index.php/Pulsed_Media_Refunds_Policy)
 * [Standard seedbox Service Level Agreement(SLA)](http://wiki.pulsedmedia.com/index.php/Pulsed_Media_Seedbox_SLA_Policy)
 * [Free Bonus Disk Quota](http://wiki.pulsedmedia.com/index.php/Pulsed_Media_Free_Bonus_Disk_Policy)
 * **Setup is INSTANT**

#### Datacenter  & Extra Info:
 * [Green Datacenter operations](http://blog.pulsedmedia.com/2017/04/steady-progress-green-operations/)
 * Uncongested network with switches optimized for high throughput applications
 * Some latency metrics: 20ms DECIX, 36ms OVH, 38ms Online, 0.4-0.6ms Cloudflare, 31ms Leaseweb, 36ms Redstation (UK), 23ms Hetzner, 23ms Serverloft aka Plusserver (DE, +many other brands). If you want something added, please comment below
 * Datacenter Location: Helsinki, Finland
 * Datacenter and network is fully operated by, and owned by us.
 * Registered company in Finland
 * [Terms Of Service](http://pulsedmedia.com/terms%20and%20conditions.pdf)

SUDO/Root access with Power service level, full dedicated (including reinstall to any Linux distro) with Power+ service level.

#### Payment methods

 * Paypal
 * IBAN/SEPA Wiretransfers
 * Crypto (BTC, LTC, XMR, ETH, DOGE and many others)


Temporary iperf3 server: 185.148.1.225
